sentences.english: Then the equation of state and partial excess chemical potential for binary system is developed.
sentences.chinese: 由配分函數求出二元系統的物態方程和偏超額化學勢。

sentences.english: The formula of equation of state of dense hydrogen plasma were presented and the numerical results were discussed in detail.
sentences.chinese: 給出了完整的物態方程公式及數值解，並進行了討論。

sentences.english: Then the equation of state for binary system is developed.
sentences.chinese: 由配分函數求出二元系統的物態方程。

sentences.english: With this method, the general form of the temperature formula and the equation of state can be obtained.
sentences.chinese: 用它得到普遍形式的溫度公式與物態方程。

sentences.english: State of matter is only one kind of artistic form.
sentences.chinese: 物態化只是藝術的一種形式。

sentences.english: The molecular interaction is the rudiment of theoretical calculation of matter function.
sentences.chinese: 分子間的相互作用勢也是物態方程理論計算的基礎。

sentences.english: Secondly, the equation of state of neutron matter at zero temperature is studied.
sentences.chinese: 其次，我們研究了零溫時中子星物質的物態方程。

sentences.english: In chapter one, the basic knowledge of the solids and EOS is given.
sentences.chinese: 論文第一章給出了固體及物態方程的基礎知識。

sentences.english: This paper introduces a way of applying the free volume theory to the formation of equations of state in the transitional section.
sentences.chinese: 本文介紹了用自由體積理論作過度區物態方程的方法。

definition: see 清風明月|清风明月[qing1 feng1 ming2 yue4]
water flea (small crustacean of genus Daphnia)
(literary) to practice medicine/to work as a pharmacist
properly/satisfactorily/firmly/very fitting/appropriate/proper/to be in good order/also written 妥帖
inked line/carpenter's straight line marker (an inked cord stretched tight then lowered onto timber)
